Name: Health & Wellness Services
General Info: Comprehensive social service network to help link students to appropriate services on campus.
Location: Marshak Science Building, Room J-15, 160 Convent Avenue, New York, NY 10031

Name: Counseling Center
General Info: Provides students with a safe, confidential space to voice concerns and address them with a counselor.
Location: Marshak Science Building, Room J-15, 160 Convent Avenue, New York, NY 10031
Times: Monday-Friday, 9:00 am - 5:00 pm, Walk-in Hours: 1:00 pm - 3:00 pm
Additional Info: Short-term counseling available, assistance with connecting to off-campus counselors for ongoing support.

Name: AccessAbility Center/Student Disability Services
General Info: Ensures full participation and meaningful access to CCNY services, programs, and activities in compliance with ADA and other non-discrimination laws.
Location: North Academic Center, Room 1/218, 160 Convent Avenue, New York, NY 10031

Name: Gender Resources
General Info: Dedicated to fostering a safe and equitable campus environment for all students, addressing gender-based violence through education, awareness, and accessible resources.
Location: Marshak Science Building, Room J-15, 160 Convent Avenue, New York, NY 10031
Additional Info: Provides support and pathways towards healing for survivors of sexual assault, intimate partner violence, and more.

Name: Benny's Food Pantry and The Urban Gardens
General Info: Provides food assistance and serves as a resource to the CUNY community, offering a range of support services. Also includes Urban Gardens for fresh food production.
Location: Hoffman Lounge, North Academic Complex (NAC), 160 Convent Avenue, New York, NY 10031
Times: Monday-Friday, 10:00 am - 4:00 pm (by appointment starting Jan 29, 2024)
Contact Info: Phone: 212.650.8208, Email: dmozeleski@ccny.cuny.edu, tburt@ccny.cuny.edu, eperezamaya@ccny.cuny.edu, mortega@ccny.cuny.edu
Additional Info: Open to anyone in the CUNY community, provides SNAP assistance, emergency grants, housing referrals, and more.
